A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: New people to the Star Wars seems to enjoy it quite a lot\, whilst most fans did not get on board.\nIn my opinion the movie was misguided at best. Mostly felt like a parody of sorts\, it was borderline mindboggling.\nJust simply watch the movie. If you haven't seen it\, means you ain't that much of a nerd and you'll most likely enjoy it.
